person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On Monday and Tuesday , students from the institute and the university launched protests against what they said was unfair handling by police of a brawl between some of their colleagues and restaurant owners in October .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| students from the institute |
| students from the university |
| police |
| some of their colleagues |
| restaurant owners |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| students from the institute |
| students from the university |
| some of their colleagues |
| restaurant owners |
| police |

Let's think step by step.

| Location |
| --- |

| the university |
| October (implicit: the location of the brawl) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

| the university |

Note: The day of the week (Monday and Tuesday) does not refer to a specific location and has been removed.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On Monday and Tuesday , students from the institute and the university launched protests against what they said was unfair handling by police of a brawl between some of their colleagues and restaurant owners in October .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| the institute |
| the university |
| police |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| the institute |
| the university |
| police (can be considered a government organization or law enforcement agency) |

However, it's important to note that "students" and "colleagues" are not organizations, but rather groups of people. "Restaurant owners" could also be considered a group, but depending on the context, it could potentially be a single organization if there is a collective name for the owners.
